name: applab-plugins
description: A curated collection of Claude Code plugins for enhanced development workflows

plugins.name: flux-capacitor
plugins.description: Feature Development Lifecycle Orchestrator - Fast worktree-based parallel development with comprehensive planning, issue tracker integration, and intelligent subagent delegation

plugins.name: sentry-issue-fixer
plugins.description: Automated Sentry error investigation and resolution - Fetches errors from Sentry, analyzes device logs (iOS/Android), and proposes comprehensive fixes

plugins.name: next-dev
plugins.description: Next.js development specialist with integrated next-devtools MCP server for runtime diagnostics, automated upgrades, page testing, and comprehensive documentation access

plugins.name: svelte-dev
plugins.description: Svelte 5 development specialist with integrated MCP server for documentation access, static code analysis, and comprehensive runes expertise ($state, $derived, $effect, $props)

plugins.name: flutter-dev
plugins.description: Flutter and Dart development specialist with integrated MCP server for code analysis, package management, testing, runtime introspection, and cross-platform mobile development

plugins.name: agents
plugins.description: Curated collection of 13 specialized agents for comprehensive development workflows across frontend, backend, mobile, testing, debugging, architecture, and DevOps

plugins.name: git-tools
plugins.description: Comprehensive Git automation tools - Intelligent commit message generation, git worktree management for isolated development, and streamlined Git workflows
